title: Five-Star Oberoi Luxury in Exotic Mauritius
description: Discover a secluded island paradise on the shores of a natural marine park at the award-winning The Oberoi Beach Resort, Mauritius. Fusing Oberoi luxury with renowned five-star service, this resort sits in arguably the most picturesque location in the world. Enjoy an amazing getaway at one of the top five hotels in Mauritius as ranked on TripAdvisor and indulge in daily gourmet breakfast, three-course dinners and a welcome drink on arrival

title: Oberoi Luxury with Nightly Dinners in Exotic Mauritius
description: Discover a secluded island paradise on the shores of a natural marine park at the award-winning The Oberoi, Mauritius. Fusing Oberoi luxury-synonymous with palaces in India-with renowned five-star service, this resort sits in arguably the most picturesque location in the world. Enjoy an amazing getaway at one of the top five hotels in Mauritius as ranked on TripAdvisor and indulge in daily gourmet breakfast, nightly buffet or a la carte dinners and a welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: Turtle Bay,, Pointe aux Piments, Mauritius

title: Five-Star Oberoi Beachfront Oasis on Mauritius' West Coast with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description:
Paradise awaits at The Oberoi Beach Resort, Mauritius a five-star address set on the pristine white-sand shores of Turtle Bay, a stunning natural marine park. Located on the bewitching west coast of the island, this luxe retreat easily blends Oberoi luxury with impeccable hospitality, stunning accommodation and authentic Mauritian charm. Boasting 20 acres of verdant gardens, direct beach access and vibrant experiences to invigorate your tired soul, this picturesque resort is truly a tropical paradise. 

Pamper your tastebuds at one of the many onsite dining options, digging into fresh seafood while taking in stunning ocean views at On the Rocks or feasting on Creole cuisine at The Restaurant. Visit The Oberoi Spa for holistic treatments that will transport you to total tranquillity or take a dip in one of the two sparkling pools. Making maximum use of its waterfront location, The Oberoi Beach Resort, Mauritius offers plenty of experiences such as scuba diving, parasailing, kayaking and more (additional charges apply). Bringing your little ones along? Allow them to have their fun at The Hub, where the Oberoi kids' club team will ensure they are kept busy while you unwind with your loved one.
offer_address: Turtle Bay, Balaclava Terre Rouge, Mauritius 20108
